description: four horizontal strips sewn together, forming tube skirt; top white strip with blue stripe at top; red strip below white; under red strip is strip with dark green ground woven with top and bottom geometric gold bands and woven overall with rows of light green circles and lines; bottom band with brown ground is woven overall in various geometric bands in golden yellow and green
inscription:
Inscription and Tag

at waist, in red ink: untranslated inscription
title: Ceremonial skirt (pa sin)
